title: ISic003700. I.Sicily inscription 003700
body:
Facsimile Images

[ἀγορασία Π]αλλαδίου τοῦ
[συμβίου τ]ῆς Πελαγίας ἐ[γέ-]
[νετο Πελαγία] τῇ π͡ρὸ ια´ καλ[ανδων]
[--- τελε]υτᾶ δ[ὲ]
5[--- Σε]πτεμβρίων
[ἐνθάδε κῖτ]ε μόνανδρο[ς]

Apparatus criticus

Text: Ferrua 1989; IG: [--- Π]α[λλ]αδίου; CIG: [Μνημεῖον Γενν]αδίου
line.5: IG and CIG: [Σε]π[τ]εμβρίω[ν]
line.6: CIG: --- ἐμὸν ἃνδρ[α]

translation

The purchase of the tomb. Palladios, the spouse of Pelagia. Pelagia having passed 11 [days] before the Kalends of [...], having died [...] of September, here she, who had one husband, lies

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0530b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] no.41 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • 4.9497 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Ferrua 1989 no.433 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
